item.description:
When you love music you just have to sing.... sing along at Jacob Wirths!

Since 1988 pianist Mel Stiller has been coming on Friday nights to play and sing songs with an "emphasis in on rock/oldies from the 50's, 60's, and 70's, with plenty of show tunes and standards, too." Sometimes we just need some beer and show tunes!!!

Singing starts at 8 and I am trying to reserve a table(s) so we can stay together, so please arrive at 7.30. I'm not sure if this bar is a 'you can be seated when you all are here' place.
item.name: Jacob Wirth Sing Along
